content.question: The students double the mass that hangs from the string. They also replace the original cart with a new cart that has double the mass. By doubling both masses, how will the tension in the string and the acceleration of the cart change?

choices.label: The tension and the acceleration will double.
The tension will double, but the acceleration will stay the same.
The tension will stay the same, but the acceleration will double.
The tension and the acceleration will stay the same.

content.answer: The tension will double, but the acceleration will stay the same.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
